heading: Account Summary
paragraph: Shows a summary of all your accounts such as current a/c,savings a/c,loan a/c,deposite a/c etc

heading: Branch Wise Summary
paragraph: A summary of your accounts categorised based on branches you hold accounts with.

heading: Calendar
paragraph: A list of upcoming events  scheduled in your calendar.

heading: Compose mail
paragraph: A shortcut widget that lets you  communicate with the bank via e-mail.

heading: Consolidated Summary
paragraph: A summary of all your linked accounts classified into various currencies.

heading: Current & Savings Account
paragraph: A summary of your operative accounts.

heading: Customer Relationship Summary
paragraph: A summary of all accounts linked to you.
